import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Checkbox, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import axios from 'axios'; import { Modal, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { NormalBrandType, NormalBrandTypeLabel, LuxuryBrandType, LuxyryBrandTypeLabel } from "../Constants/Brand/BrandConstants"; const Info = ({ brand, handleClose }) => { const getBrandTypeName = (id) => { return id == LuxuryBrandType ? LuxyryBrandTypeLabel : NormalBrandTypeLabel; } return ( <> Detailed Brand Infomation
setName(e.target.value)}/> setQuantity(e.target.value)}/> setOriginalPrice(e.target.value)}/> setPrice(e.target.value)}/> setDescription(e.target.value)}/> setTimeCreate(e.target.value)}/> setStatus(e.target.value)}/> setViewCount(e.target.value)}/> setDetails(e.target.value)}/> setThumbnailImage(e.target.value)}/>
); } export default Info;
